assingTerritoriesToPlayers(Map, List<Player>) - Method in class com.risk.business.impl.ManagePlayer

attack(GamePlay) - Method in class com.risk.model.Strategy.Aggressive
Attack for an Aggressive Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This Player main goal is always attack with strongest territory until it cannot attack anymore.
attack(GamePlay) - Method in class com.risk.model.Strategy.Benevolent
Benevolent Player never believes to attack any of his opponent
attack(GamePlay) - Method in class com.risk.model.Strategy.Cheater
Attack for a Cheater Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This Player automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries.
attack(GamePlay) - Method in class com.risk.model.Strategy.Human
Attack for a Human Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.
attack(GamePlay) - Method in class com.risk.model.Strategy.Random
Attack for a Random Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This player attacks a random number of times a random country.
attackArmyMove(GamePlay) - Method in class com.risk.business.impl.ManagePlayer
This method performs army move when attacker occupies defender territory.
AttackArmyMove - Class in com.risk.model
This model here represents the move of transferring armies once an attacker captures some defender territory.
AttackArmyMove() - Constructor for class com.risk.model.AttackArmyMove
 
attackArmyMoveInvalidNeighbouringTest() - Method in class com.risk.model.Strategy.HumanTest
This test checks for Invalid attack to defender only if defender territory is not neighboring territory of attacker or attacker is attacking on his own territory.
attackArmyMoveValidNeighbouringTest() - Method in class com.risk.model.Strategy.HumanTest
This test checks for Valid attack to defender only if defender territory is neighboring territory of attacker.
